item.title: 毛里求斯威胁打击外汇投机活动
item.description: 毛里求斯银行新行长在宣布改善当地市场美元流动性的措施时，警告货币交易商他正在关注他们。【原文：The new governor of the Bank of Mauritius warned currency dealers he was watching them, as he announced steps to improve dollar liquidity in the local market.】

item.title: Soho House 在收到溢价收购要约后飙升
item.description: Soho House & Co Inc.股价飙升，因为这家全球会员制平台称，它收到了一份以高于当前市值的价格收购该公司的要约。【原文：Soho House & Co Inc. shares are soaring after the global membership platform said it received an offer to buy the company at a premium to its current market value.】

item.title: 阿根廷采取措施加速米莱的美元化战略
item.description: 阿根廷政府正在与各大银行和支付公司合作，争分夺秒地推进哈维尔-米莱伊的美元化战略，尽管比索的需求量很大。【原文：Argentina’s government is racing against time as it works with major banks and payment firms to advance Javier Milei’s dollarization strategy even as pesos are in high demand.】

item.title: 摩根大通的米歇尔认为 2025 年国债市场有机会恢复平静
item.description: 债券市场资深人士鲍勃-米歇尔（Bob Michele）说，2025 年有一种情况投资者还没有做好充分准备：近十年来最平静的国债市场。【原文：Bond-market veteran Bob Michele says there’s one scenario investors aren’t fully prepared for in 2025: the calmest Treasury market in nearly a decade.】

item.title: 布雷纳德吹捧供应链复苏，警告特朗普警惕中国伎俩
item.description: 拜登政府呼吁唐纳德-特朗普的团队继续努力加强供应链，并将关键的战略产业迁回美国，并表示如果出现新的风险，自大流行病以来艰难取得的进展可能会化为乌有。【原文：The Biden administration is calling on Donald Trump’s team to continue work on bolstering supply chains and moving key strategic industries back to the US, saying hard-fought progress since the pandemic could evaporate if fresh risks emerge.】

item.title: 摩科瑞与赞比亚合作成立金属贸易公司
item.description: 摩科瑞能源集团（Mercuria Energy Group）正与赞比亚合作开展金属贸易，这是大宗商品公司与矿产资源丰富的国家合作以确保获得关键资源的最新例证。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group is teaming up with Zambia on a metals trading venture, the latest example of a commodity house partnering with a mineral-rich state to secure access to key resources.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）与创业公司 Vast 就宇航员前往空间站签署协议
item.description: 由前加密大亨杰德-麦卡勒布（Jed McCaleb）创办的航空航天初创公司 Vast Space LLC 已聘请 SpaceX 公司向国际空间站发射两次私人宇航员任务，这是该公司将地球轨道商业化计划的一部分。【原文：Vast Space LLC, the aerospace startup founded by former crypto tycoon Jed McCaleb, has hired SpaceX to launch two private astronaut missions to the International Space Station, part of its plans to commercialize Earth’s orbit.】

item.title: 刚果的神秘疾病是多种疾病的混合体，已致人死亡
item.description: 在刚果民主共和国，一种类似流感的疾病使数百人染病，这种疾病是该地区常见疾病的混合体，在因食物短缺而虚弱的人群中演变成了严重的疾病。【原文：A flu-like illness that’s sickened hundreds of people in the Democratic Republic of Congo is a mix of diseases common in the region that have morphed into severe forms in a population weakened by food shortages.】

item.title: 美国上周初请失业金人数在假日波动期间下降
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数在本月早些时候飙升后，上周有所下降，延续了假日季节经常出现的连续波动。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits fell last week after spiking earlier this month, continuing a streak of volatility that often occurs during the holiday season.】

item.title: 美国经济增长修正为 3.1%，原因是消费支出和出口增长强劲
item.description: 美国经济在第三季度的扩张速度快于此前的估计，部分原因是消费者支出和出口强劲。【原文：The US economy expanded at a faster pace in the third quarter than previously estimated, owing in part to to stronger consumer spending and exports.】

item.title: 通胀风险持续存在，捷克八次降息后仍维持利率不变
item.description: 捷克共和国停止了长达一年的货币宽松周期，因为对持续通胀的担忧战胜了疲软的经济前景。【原文：The Czech Republic brought its year-long monetary-easing cycle to a halt as concern over persistent inflation prevailed over a weak economic outlook.】

item.title: 中国小金属出口禁令为加拿大企业带来希望
item.description: 中国禁止向美国出口利基金属的举措为加拿大生产商创造了机会；尽管即将上任的特朗普政府的关税威胁可能会限制他们的前景。【原文：China’s move to ban exports of niche metals to the US is creating opportunities for Canadian producers — though tariff threats by the incoming Trump administration may limit their prospects.】

item.title: 普京称俄罗斯不会与乌克兰续签天然气协议
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）周四表示，由于基辅拒绝在本月底合同到期后延长合同，俄罗斯目前通过乌克兰向欧洲运输天然气的合同将不再续签。【原文：The current contract to ship Russian gas via Ukraine to Europe will not be renewed as Kyiv has refused to extend it beyond its expiry at the end of this month, President Vladimir Putin said Thursday.】

item.title: 韩元触发高达 500 亿美元的养老金出售计划
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，韩元汇率已经疲软到可能迫使国民年金局出售价值高达近 500 亿美元的外汇来对冲损失的水平。【原文：Korea’s won has weakened to levels that can force the National Pension Service to sell up to almost $50 billion worth of foreign exchange to hedge against losses, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 家庭因青少年芬太尼危机而起诉 Snapchat
item.description:
一项诉讼称，该平台帮助毒贩向儿童出售致命的假药。原告的法律策略可能会改变我们所熟知的互联网。【原文：

A lawsuit argues that the platform helped dealers sell children deadly counterfeit drugs. The plaintiffs’ legal strategy could change the internet as we know it.

】

item.title: 朝鲜黑客在 2024 年盗取了创纪录的 13 亿美元加密货币
item.description: 据 Chainalysis 公司称，与朝鲜有联系的黑客今年从加密货币平台上窃取的资金比以往任何时候都多，显示出研究人员认为威胁美国国家安全的能力正在不断增强。【原文：North Korea-linked hackers stole more from cryptocurrency platforms this year than ever before, according to Chainalysis Inc., showcasing rising capabilities that researchers say threaten US national security.】

item.title: 石油前景可能没有人们担心的那么糟糕
item.description:
"欧佩克+"目前正在控制供应，而其他地区的产量还存在疑问。【原文：

OPEC+ is keeping a grip on supply for now and there are question marks over production elsewhere.

】

item.title: 达顿股价大涨，因前景预示食客将回归
item.description: 达顿餐饮公司（Darden Restaurants Inc.【原文：Darden Restaurants Inc. shares gained as much as 9.5% in premarket trading after the Olive Garden-owner’s raised full-year sales outlook topped estimates.】

item.title: 激进分子 Palliser 敦促力拓重新审视其双重上市计划
item.description: Palliser Capital UK Ltd 试图向力拓集团施加更大压力，迫使其在年度股东大会上提交一份决议，对双重上市结构进行审查，从而统一力拓集团的双重上市结构。【原文：Palliser Capital UK Ltd has sought to put more pressure on Rio Tinto Group to unify its dual listing by submitting a resolution to conduct a review into the structure at its annual shareholder meeting.】

item.title: TikTok 提供了为美国生命辩护的最后机会
item.description: 在美国，TikTok 在为生存而战的第 11 个小时取得了胜利。但首先...【原文：TikTok notched an 11th-hour win in its fight to stay alive in the US. But first...】

item.title: 2024 年最具戏剧性的五大科技股下一步将如何发展？
item.description: 在 2024 年，人工智能行业的发展势头更加迅猛，Nvidia 公司和 Meta Platforms 公司等巨头连续第二次跻身 S&P 500 指数。【原文：Tech investors will remember 2024 as a year in which the artificial intelligence trade gained even more steam and giants like Nvidia Corp. and Meta Platforms Inc. carried the S&P 500 for the second time in a row.】

item.title: 鲍威尔认为美联储将进入新阶段，重心将回到通胀问题上
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们关注美联储的新政策阶段。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at the Fed’s new policy phase. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 世贸组织年终显示瘫痪多于进步
item.description: 世界贸易组织本周举行了其 2024 年会议的最后一次会议，对于任何希望该机构在其成立 30 周年之前达成讨论已久的协议的人来说，会议结果都有点难以接受。【原文：The World Trade Organization held the last of its 2024 meetings this week, and for anyone rooting for the institution to conclude long-discussed agreements just ahead of its 30th anniversary, the results were a little hard to watch.】

item.title: 低垂的果实 "已不复存在，人工智能巨头寻求新策略
item.description:
最先进的新型人工智能系统的进展速度低于预期。【原文：

Progress on the most advanced new AI systems has been slower than expected.

】

item.title: 波兰明年将发行欧元债券启动外汇债务销售
item.description: 波兰财政部一位高级官员表示，由于美元市场的吸引力下降，波兰明年可能将以欧元债券销售作为外币债务发行的开端。【原文：Poland will likely start its foreign-currency debt issues next year with a euro bond sale as the US-dollar market has become less attractive, according to a senior Finance Ministry official.】

item.title: 英国央行坚持宽松计划，三位官员支持降息
item.description: 英国央行表示将在 2025 年继续逐步放宽政策，因为越来越多的官员抛开了通胀持续存在的证据，支持立即削减借贷成本。【原文：The Bank of England signaled it will keep easing gradually in 2025 as a growing minority of officials set aside evidence of lingering inflation to back an immediate cut in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 私人信贷期待消费者和基础设施进入下一阶段
item.description: 私人信贷公司想要的不仅仅是企业贷款。最大的私人信贷公司正在为从汽车贷款和住宅抵押贷款到芯片制造和数据中心的一切融资活动奠定基础，力争使市场规模扩大到数万亿美元。【原文：Private credit firms want more than corporate lending. The largest are laying the groundwork to finance everything from auto loans and residential mortgages to chip manufacturing and data centers in an effort to swell the size of the market by the trillions.】

item.title: KKR 称外汇波动可能成为 2025 年市场的 "致命弱点
item.description: KKR & Co.公司警告说，2025年货币市场的波动可能成为投资者的 "阿喀琉斯之踵"，因为不断增长的赤字和贸易战的威胁可能会扰乱该公司认为仍有上升空间的牛市。【原文：KKR & Co. is warning that a volatile currency market could be an “Achilles heel” for investors in 2025, as growing deficits and the threat of trade wars may disrupt a bull market that it says still has room to run.】

item.title: 英国石油公司与伊拉克推进基尔库克油气田再开发项目
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）周四表示，该公司与伊拉克政府就重新开发多产的基尔库克油气田的技术条款达成了协议。【原文：BP Plc reached an agreement with the Iraqi government on technical terms to redevelop the prolific Kirkuk oil and gas fields, the company said Thursday.】

item.title: 法国将在没有预算的情况下推进 3,000 亿欧元债券计划
item.description: 法国政府本月初下台后，法国债务机构一直在等待新的预算，因此其 2025 年的发行计划与最初的目标保持不变。【原文：France’s debt agency kept its issuance plans for 2025 unchanged from an initial target as it awaits a new budget following the ouster of the government earlier this month.】
